name: poru-example
description: An example bot on how to use poru in a basic level

scripts.node-update: npm i --save-dev node@17 && npm config set prefix=$(pwd)/node_modules/node && export PATH=$(pwd)/node_modules/node/bin:$PATH
scripts.node-clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clear --force && npm cache clean --force && npm i
scripts.node-update-then-clean: npm run node-update && npm run node-clean

author: PARAS
